name: elab4g

|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, universe), w0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0))

stmt.origin: elab2g(s0, c0, universe, c1, w0, w1)
stmt.pretty: elab2g(s0, c0, universe, c1, w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(c0, c1), w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
-| wceq(c1, cab(s0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Membership in a class abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-2012.)
